body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
https://community.temporal.io/t/doing-cleanup-when-using-sessions/193

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Cancellation of a workflow should allow executing some cleanup logic in a session without ugly workarounds.

comments.body: Cleanup in session cannot finished correctly in cancellation of workflow, maybe we can set an option like "keep session info" when use 'NewDisconnectedContext', or export queue of sessionInfo to set queue manually

title: Support seamless cleanup during session cancellation
